keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: Use either home-made or shop-bought pancakes for this recipe.

method.text: Warm pancakes in oven. Melt margarine in a pan, then stir in flour and cook for 2 min. Add milk slowly, stirring constantly. Bring to boil. Cool.
Stir in chicken. Divide mixture between pancakes and roll up. Place in a greased ovenproof dish. Top with the tomatoes and cheese. Bake for 30 min.

title: Stuffed pancakes
